mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_client_config(source_type, source_id, target_type, target_id, ext_param, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES(#{sourceType}, #{sourceId}, #{targetType}, #{targetId}, #{extParam}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE ai_client_config SET source_type = #{sourceType}, source_id = #{sourceId}, target_type = #{targetType}, target_id = #{targetId}, ext_param = #{extParam}, status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, source_type, source_id, target_type, target_id, ext_param, status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_client_config WHERE source_id = #{sourceId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
